comments: In Siegel's notation, Delta has been normalized already.T_0 is unique weight-2 normalized meromorphic modular form for SL(2,Z) with all poles at infinity.
references: C. L. Siegel, Advanced Analytic Number Theory, Tata Institute of Fundamental Research, Bombay, 1980, pp. 249-268.
formula: G.f.: G_14/Delta. (in Siegel's notation)Expansion of (j(q)^4 (j(q) - 1728)^3 Delta(q))^(1/6) in powers of q = exp(2 Pi I t). - _Michael Somos_, Jul 29 2014
prog: (PARI) {a(n) = local(A); if( n<-1, 0, A = x^3 * O(x^n); polcoeff( (x * eta(x + A)^24 * ellj(x + A)^4 * (ellj(x + A) - 1728)^3)^(1/6), n))}; /* _Michael Somos_, Jul 29 2014 */
author: Barry Brent (barryb(AT)primenet.com)
